## Problem / Use Case

A clear description of the problem you're trying to solve or the use case for this feature.

Example: _I want to add real-time shadows to my scene but there's no CSS property for it._

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution or API.

```html
<!-- Example of how it might work -->
<div
  string="3d"
  string-3d="directionalLight"
  style="--light-cast-shadow: true;"
></div>
```

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context

- Is this feature available in similar libraries?
- Any relevant links, mockups, or examples?
- Would you be willing to contribute this feature?

How important is this feature for your project?

- [ ] Critical — blocking my project
